Code.Name: Business rule violation, fatal
Code.Description: Warning related to a business rule that indicates a problem but that does not hinder further processing at this point in time.

Code.Name: Business rule violation, warning
Code.Description: Warning related to a business rule that indicates a problem but that does not hinder further processing at this point in time.

Code.Name: Syntax violation
Code.Description: Error related to the syntax composition that prevents further processing.

Code.Name: Reference not found
Code.Description: Tender or procedure cannot be found, therefore the request must be rejected.

Code.Name: Deadline expired
Code.Description: The deadline expired before your request was received.

Code.Name: Request failed
Code.Description: The request cannot be processed due to uncertain reasons.

Code.Name: Wrong transaction flow
Code.Description: Error related to the order in which the request was received in comparison to the procedure.

Code.Name: Invalid request
Code.Description: Request cannot be processed due to the

Code.Name: Missing authorisation
Code.Description: The sender of the request does not hold the permission to access this procedure.

Code.Name: Authentication exception
Code.Description: The sender of the request cannot be identified.

Code.Name: Process termination
Code.Description: The process was terminated by the sender of this message, and will not be continued.
